Package Mail

Class MailUtil

java.lang.Object
Mail.MailUtil
public class MailUtil extends Object
Class is used to send Mails by authentic the mail with the given password. Creating a message and sending it by parsing the given information in an email form.
Author:
Viktor Benini, StudentID: 1298976, Amalie Wilke, 1304925

    • sendMailUpdateReminder

      public static void sendMailUpdateReminder(String recipient, Appointment.Appointment appointment) throws javax.mail.MessagingException
      This method is called to send a mail to confirm the changes made to an existing appointment. Method opens a connection to the provided email by setting the properties (authentication require?, port, ...). Then prepares the message in a new method and sends it.
      Parameters:
      recipient -
      appointment -
      Throws:
      javax.mail.MessagingException
